portfolio.title: Kindergarten Finder
portfolio.subtitle: Kindergarten map and listing, built with React, Google maps API and Facebook API
portfolio.description:
Final project for FEND Degree aligned with the real needs, and hopefully the result can be useful for some people. 
 ESPA is an European funding program which, among other, provides preschool sponsorship for parents with low income in Greece. Every year the catalogues of nurseries and kindergartens are published on the website as pdf, and as a parent you spend quite some time, googling every address in your area trying to find if it's located close to you. The backend script parses this PDF files and geocodes all the addresses, exporting a nice-formatted json with only useful information. This json is loaded on front end to Google Map, showing all the locations together with data on the ages of children, operation hours, etc. The app also attempts to search for the page of kindergarten on Facebook, and if it exists, shows some useful information from it.

portfolio.title: Merlin2Excel
portfolio.subtitle: A simple tool for converting Merlin Project timetable into nice Excel template

images.alt: Screenshot of source file and result

portfolio.description: A simple Node.js tool, created to avoid routine tasks at my office job. It's purpose is so specific, that it's probably useless for anyone else, although it can work with any type of data. The script parses xml file, exported from Merlin project, and creates a nice client-friendly Excel table. It also preserves the formatting (e.g. one task - one line), and applies colors to each type of activity, based on simple dictionary.
